full_text: The growth of tech ﬁrms and intangible assets has fuelled a rise in tax avoidance, to the point where 40% of multinationals’ overseas proﬁts are shifted to havens https://t.co/ETA0Yvec3s

localize.full_text: テクノロジー企業や無形資産の増加は、租税回避の増加を助長し、多国籍企業の海外資産の40％が租税回避地に移されているほどです。https://t.co/ETA0Yvec3s
